doc:
Gaston Mervale https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaston_Mervale 0 Gaston Mervale (1882–1934) was an Australian director and actor who worked extensively on stage and in films. He directed several films for the Australian Life Biograph Company. After this wound up he went to New York and worked as an actor for several years. He returned to Australia in 1917 to produce plays. Gaston_Mervale ( 1882 – 1934 ) was an_Australian_director and actor who worked extensively on stage and in films . He directed several_films for the_Australian_Life_Biograph_Company . After this_wound up he went to New_York and worked as an_actor for several_years . He returned to Australia in 1917 to_produce plays .
